review: The Fire TV Stick has works very well for streaming Prime Video and Netflix. However, the Hulu app for the Fire TV Stick is just awful. It freezes constantly, and the video often goes black while audio playback continues. I have given up on using this for steaming Hulu, which is unfortunate, since that was one of the main reasons that I purchased this device. The Fire TV Stick also has less content available than other devices like the Roku, which I use for another TV in the house. However, keep in mind that the Fire TV Stick is slightly cheaper, so that is also a consideration.I would gladly revise this review at a later date if the Hulu app becomes workable and/or more content becomes available. It's not a bad product, but could have been a lot better.Updated  7.24.15Well, I'm not sure what happened, but I tried using Hulu again recently and it worked flawlessly. That and the addition of additional apps (especially HBO Go and Starz Play) turn this in to a 5-star product for me.
